document_data.mainbody:
ula Ghevora was a middle class inhabitant of the city of Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Sula was a human woman of tan skin tone and dar brown eyes. She wore quality clothes with blue hues being favored, and golden jewelry.
In the , as the Cult of the Absolute menaced the city of Baldurs Gate, the gates between the Lower City of Baldurs Gate and its more affluent Upper City were closed, monitored by the Flaming Fist mercenaries and allowing only the wealthy and current residents of the Upper City through. Sula Ghevora was among those Baldurians who sought entrance into the Upper City, lamenting that people like her could barely afford to rent a basement in the rich upper-crust neighborhood.
